dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Infringement Notice]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, September 10, 2004 10:46 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Infringement Notice]

Forarding to Legal for review.


-- 
Thanks,
Garrett White
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/



-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA Infringement Notice
Date: Fri, 10 Sep 2004 09:35:28 +1000
From: Australian Travel Emporium <thely@bigpond.net.au>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

FOR ATTENTION:  George Poletes

On August 20th 2004, I submitted via fax a DMCA infringement notice in
accordance with the details appearing on http://www.theplanet.com/legal/
The offending site is www.gotofound.com and the copied site is
www.austtravel.com.au

The offending site is still online and still apparently running on your
servers, despite your published documentation stating that "the Service
Provider will ..... expeditiously remove or disable access to the material
that is claimed to be infringing"

A phone call to the office of your Chief Operating Officer resulted in this
enquiry being directed to you. My three calls to your office have all
resulted in an answering service and I did not wish to cover this in a
message.

Can you confirm ASAP if my faxed notification of Aug 20th has been received
and if so, please provide me with advice on actions taken or pending.

Kind regards

Terry Hely
Principal
Australian Travel Emporium
http://www.auattravel.com.au
trhely@bigpond.net.au
Tel: +61 7 3205 6048
